languages.text: "Давай-ка лучше поговорим о твоей роли в произошедшем. Ты допустил это восстание, считай что поспособствовал ему".

traits.locale_text: "Давай-ка лучше поговорим о твоей роли в произошедшем. Ты допустил это восстание, считай что поспособствовал ему".

languages.text: "Let's talk about your role in all this instead. You allowed this revolt to happen, your actions practically guaranteed it would."
languages.original_text: "Давай-ка лучше поговорим о твоей роли в произошедшем. Ты допустил это восстание, считай что поспособствовал ему".

traits.locale_text: "Let's talk about your role in all this instead. You allowed this revolt to happen, your actions practically guaranteed it would."
"Let's talk about your role in all this instead. You allowed this revolt to happen, your actions practically guaranteed it would."
"Let's talk about your role in all this instead. You allowed this revolt to happen, your actions practically guaranteed it would."
"Let's talk about your role in all this instead. You allowed this revolt to happen, your actions practically guaranteed it would."

languages.text: “不如来谈谈你在这场事件中扮演的角色吧。你允许底层甲板发生叛乱，而你的行为基本就是这场叛乱的导火索。”
languages.original_text: "Let's talk about your role in all this instead. You allowed this revolt to happen, your actions practically guaranteed it would."

traits.locale_text: “不如来谈谈你在这场事件中扮演的角色吧。你允许底层甲板发生叛乱，而你的行为基本就是这场叛乱的导火索。”

languages.text: «En vez de eso, hablemos de su papel en todo esto. Usted permitió que se produjera esta revuelta; sus decisiones prácticamente lo garantizaron».
languages.original_text: "Let's talk about your role in all this instead. You allowed this revolt to happen, your actions practically guaranteed it would."

traits.locale_text: «En vez de eso, hablemos de su papel en todo esto. Usted permitió que se produjera esta revuelta; sus decisiones prácticamente lo garantizaron».

languages.text: 「代わりにお前の役割について話すとしよう。お前はこの反乱の発生を許し、お前の行動はそれを事実上保証した」
languages.original_text: "Let's talk about your role in all this instead. You allowed this revolt to happen, your actions practically guaranteed it would."

traits.locale_text: 「代わりにお前の役割について話すとしよう。お前はこの反乱の発生を許し、お前の行動はそれを事実上保証した」

languages.text: "Sprechen wir lieber über Eure Rolle in all dem. Ihr habt zugelassen, dass diese Revolte geschieht, Euer Handeln hat das praktisch garantiert."
languages.original_text: "Let's talk about your role in all this instead. You allowed this revolt to happen, your actions practically guaranteed it would."

traits.locale_text: "Sprechen wir lieber über Eure Rolle in all dem. Ihr habt zugelassen, dass diese Revolte geschieht, Euer Handeln hat das praktisch garantiert."

languages.text: « Parlons plutôt de votre rôle dans cette affaire. Par vos agissements, vous avez vous-même semé les graines de la révolte. »
languages.original_text: "Let's talk about your role in all this instead. You allowed this revolt to happen, your actions practically guaranteed it would."

traits.locale_text: « Parlons plutôt de votre rôle dans cette affaire. Par vos agissements, vous avez vous-même semé les graines de la révolte. »

languages.text: "Biraz da bu olaydaki rolünden bahsedelim. İsyanın çıkmasına müsaade ettin. Hatta bunu sağladın."
languages.original_text: "Let's talk about your role in all this instead. You allowed this revolt to happen, your actions practically guaranteed it would."

traits.locale_text: "Biraz da bu bütünün içindeki rolünden bahsedelim. Bu isyanın çıkmasına sen müsaade ettin. Hatta bunu sağladın."
